cards.rules_text:
Poised Flame deals 2 damage to any target.
Add {R}{R}. You can't spend this mana to cast spells.

When Urban Explorer enters, return a permanent card with mana value 1 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
Landfall - Whenever a land you control enters, Urban Explorer gets +2/+1 until end of turn.
Sacrifice Archaeovolcanologist: Choose an instant, sorcery, or land card in your graveyard. You may play that card this turn.

{2}: Exile the top card of your library face down. You may look at it as long as it remains exiled.

When Diamond Dust enters and whenever you cast a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

{1}, Sacrifice Claw Fossil: Target creature has base toughness 1 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
Surface {2}{B}. Claw Fossil surfaces transformed. (You may cast a copy of this from your graveyard if there are six or more other cards there by exiling it and paying the surface cost.)
cards.rules_text2: Whenever Reborn Scuttler attacks, up to one target creature has base toughness 1 until end of turn.

cards.rules_text:
Choose up to one target creature you control. You may discard a card. If you do, whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player this turn, draw a card.
Draw a card.

Calmed Battleground enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, Teetering Panda deals 2 damage to them if they control a tapped permanent. If they control three or more, you gain 2 life and draw a card.
{2}, {T}: You may tap or untap another target creature.
{2}, {Q}: Put a stun counter on target creature.

(As a Weather enters, players sacrifice other Weathers that don't share a color with it.)
Whenever you attack, Sunny Day deals X damage to target player or planeswalker, where X is the number of attacking creatures.

Haste
Talon Triplets can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
Amity - Whenever you attack with Talon Triplets and exactly one other creature, that creature can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn.

Create two 1/1 white Golem creature tokens.
Landfall - {W}, Exile The Ruins Awaken from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 white Golem creature token. Activate only as a sorcery and only if a land entered the battlefield under your control this turn.

Choose one - 
:: Destroy target noncreature artifact with mana value X.
:: Burn Up deals X damage to target creature or planeswalker.

Flying, lifelink
{2}{W}: Untap each creature you've activated this turn. They get +1/+1 and gain lifelink until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color. If you don't control a Weather, spend this mana only to cast a Weather spell.
Landfall - Whenever a land you control enters, Pitfall Pincher deals 1 damage to any target. If that target is a creature, it blocks this turn if able.

Golems you control have menace.
Unyielding Titan can't attack or block unless you control three or more Golems.
Whenever Unyielding Titan enters or attacks, target opponent reveals their hand. Exile a nonland card from their hand or graveyard.
{3}, {T}: Create a 1/1 white Golem creature token.
{T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

You may cast this spell as though it had flash if you activated a nonmana ability this turn.
Target artifact or creature's owner puts it on their choice of the top or bottom of their library.

Flying
When Swooping Hunter enters, create a Berry token, then you may return another creature you control to its owner's hand. (It's an Equipment with equip {1} and "Before damage, sacrifice this to give equipped creature +1/+1 until end of turn.")

Search your graveyard and/or library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Surface {G} (You may cast a copy of this from your graveyard if there are six or more other cards there by exiling it and paying the surface cost.)

Create three Berry tokens, then sacrifice any number of Berries. For each Berry sacrificed this way, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. (They're Equipment with equip {1} and "Before damage, sacrifice this to give equipped creature +1/+1 until end of turn.")

When Aqua Gang Diver enters, surveil 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
Spells you cast from your graveyard cost {1} less to cast.
Each player chooses up to one nontoken, nonland permanent they control. They lose life equal to its mana value. Destroy the rest.
{T}, Discard a card: Put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control and untap it. It gains haste until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

This spell costs {1} less to cast if there is a card named Avert Disaster or Imminent Disaster in your graveyard.
Counter target spell.

When Practicing Guru enters, create a Berry token. (It's an Equipment with equip {1} and "Before damage, sacrifice this to give equipped creature +1/+1 until end of turn.")
Practicing Guru gets +1/+1 as long as you've sacrificed a Berry that was attached to it this turn.
Sacrifice a Berry attached to Practicing Guru: It gains indestructible until end of turn.
Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. You gain life equal to its toughness.

When Parental Pair enters, create a token that's a copy of it, except it's 2/2 and doesn't have this ability.
Amity - Whenever you attack with Parental Pair and exactly one other creature, you may have Parental Pair fight target creature.

:: Tap target creature.
:: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

{1}{R}: Bubbling Firesnail gets +2/-2 until end of turn.

{T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

:: Exile target enchantment.

Amity - Whenever you attack with Splashing Mudskipper and exactly one other creature, surveil 1. When Splashing Mudskipper deals combat damage to a player this combat, you may transform it.

Amity - Whenever Surging Mudskipper attacks, surveil 1. You may play that card from your graveyard this turn. If exactly one other creature attacked with it, this ability triggers three times instead.
